roleset.name: to utter the cry of a hen brooding or calling her chicks
roleset.note: CLUCK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cluck' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 38 37.3. (from cluck.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Chicken
example.text: The chicken clucked until all her chicks had gathered.

example.name: Human
example.text: Mary clucked and cooed over her baby.
